page.shortlink: api objects query object order get function
page.description: The .ORDER_GET() method returns the order expression for the query list.
page.example: dim tbl as P dim qry as P dim ptr as P tbl = table.open("test") query.filter = "ID <> ''" query.options = "D" qry = tbl.query_create() ? qry.order_get() = "ID"
